CustomField.description:
Indicates how the base price should be defaulted when the asset is renewed. Valid Values are:
Net Unit Price (default if not specified) Higher Of Contract Unit Price / Net Unit Price Lower Of Contract Unit Price / Net Unit Price
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Indicates how the base price should be defaulted when the asset is renewed. Valid Values are:
Net Unit Price (default if not specified) Higher Of Contract Unit Price / Net Unit Price Lower Of Contract Unit Price / Net Unit Price
CustomField.label: Base Price Defaulting Method For Renewal
